title: Border, 1835–45
medium: Block-printed and flocked on handmade paper
inscribed: Verso bears the imprint of an earlier border: 1972-42-30.
description:
Rococo moldings decorate the upper and lower edgings; enclosed between them, with a flocked background is a frieze of flowers of alternating colors; printed in yellow, gold, blues, greens, with a rust and dark brown flocked background.

H# 555

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1835–45.
1835–45. Block-printed and flocked on handmade paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-67-a/e.
